title: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day - How We Began
description: MRS. MEYER'S CLEAN DAY household products were inspired by Mrs. Thelma A. Meyer, an Iowa homemaker and mother of nine. It all started when one of her daughters was walking down a cleaning aisle, eyeing all the products with their harsh, stinky chemicals. Right then and there, she had as idea: "Let's make cleaners that smell nice, like a garden, but still work like the dickens on a daily dirt and grime." She named the product line after her very practical mom and the common sense values she passed along to her kids.

transcripts: So maybe you're wondering who is Mrs. Meyer and is she even a real person? The answer is yes Mrs. Meyer's cleaned a household cleaners were inspired by Mrs. Thelma A Meyer and I'm a home maker and mother of nine. Years later one of her daughters had an idea it came to her as she walked down the cleaning isle eyeing all the products with their harsh stinky chemicals there's got to be a better way she thought. Right then and there she made a decision only cleaners that smell nice like my mom's garden but they will work like the absolute Dickens on daily dirt and grime no gloves or masks required and so she did she named her products after her very practical mom and the common-sense values she passed along to her kids and now everyone who uses them discovers that a clean home can smell as good as it feels. [Music]
